title: Can a former US President be chosen as a running mate for this year's presidential election? - Quora
tags: Political Campaigns in the United States of America
Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Yes. Jimmy Carter can be Biden’s running mate. Jimmy Carter is still alive, and he’s only served one term so far. So he could definitely serve as Biden’s running mate. Bill Clinton, George W. Bush and Barack Obama would all be ineligible, as they have served two terms already. You can’t be VP if you can’t be President. Biden-Carter would be some ticket. It would make Biden seem young, so there is some strategy for choosing Jimmy.
Yes — Jimmy Carter could be chosen as the VP this year. He served only one term, and is therefore eligible to serve as VP.
